title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Large-Scale Online Learning for Information Literacy in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Media Usage Experience, Simple Information Retrieval Skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can judge the credibility of information from diverse sources using a three-tier evaluation standard (author, source, recency).
Learners can extract relevant materials with 80% accuracy by utilizing search term combination techniques (Boolean operators, filtering) during complex information searches.
Learners can identify fake news cases from a digital citizenship perspective and present at least three counterarguments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
